{{NCAATeamFootballSeason |Year=1958 |Team=Wyoming Cowboys |Image= |ImageSize = |Conference=Skyline Conference (Mountain States){{!}}Skyline Conference |Division= |ShortConference=Skyline |Record=8-3 |ConfRecord=6-1 |CoachRank= Not ranked |APRank=Not ranked |HeadCoach=[[Bob Devaney]] |OffCoach= |DefCoach= |OScheme= |DScheme= |Stadium=[[War Memorial Stadium (Wyoming)|War Memorial Stadium]] |Champion= |BowlTourney=Sun Bowl |BowlTourneyResult= W, 14-6, Hardin-Simmons }} The '''1958 Wyoming Cowboys football team''' represented the [[University of Wyoming]] in the 1958 NCAA football season. The Cowboys offense scored 205 points while the defense allowed 136 points. Led by head coach Bob Devaney, the Cowboys finished the season with eight wins. ==Schedule== {|class="wikitable" width="80%" |- align="center" style="background:#593D2B;color:#DDCCA5;" | '''Game''' || '''Date''' || '''Opponent''' || '''Result''' || '''Cowboys points''' || '''Opponents''' || '''Record''' |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 1 || Sept. 20 || @ Kansas State || Loss || 14 ||17 || 0-1 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 2 || Sept. 27|| Montana || Win ||21 || 14 || 1-1 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 3 || Oct. 4 || Denver|| Win ||15||12|| 2-1 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 4 ||Oct. 11 || Oregon State || Win || 28|| 0|| 3-1 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 5 || Oct. 18|| @ Colorado State || Win || 7||6|| 4-1 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 6 || Oct. 25 || New Mexico || Loss || 12||13|| 4-2 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 7 || Nov. 1|| Utah || Win || 25 ||20 ||5-2 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 8 || Nov. 8 || @ Utah State || Win || 41 || 13 || 6-2 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 9 || Nov. 15|| @ Air Force || Loss || 6|| 21|| 6-3 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 10 || Nov. 22 || @ Brigham Young || Win || 22 ||14 || 7-3 |- align="center" bgcolor="" |}<ref>http://cfreference.net/cfr/school.s?id=442&season=1958</ref>
